CustomField.description: Indicates whether this is one of the top-level, predefined revenue classifications. VALUE ASSIGNED BY DELPHI.FDC AND SHOULD NOT BE MODIFIED.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether this is one of the top-level, predefined revenue classifications. VALUE ASSIGNED BY DELPHI.FDC AND SHOULD NOT BE MODIFIED.
CustomField.label: Is Root Classification
